About

Descension is an OpenWorld Survival Horror Game That features constant new expansions and events. Survive For Six hours in uncharted universes, and get your exploration rewarded with a stronger arsenal. What sets it apart from other indie games like it, is The Impressive visual quality, focus on dark Atmosphere, and Great Presentation. It focuses on the theories of the multiverse, and the horrors that might come from far-gone exploration.

The Future of Survival Horror

The goal is to survive within the open-world levels while taking on terrifying enemies. Each region will have Antagonists that will hunt you throughout the entirety of your playthrough. The arcade-like FPS combat is Hard, interesting and crucial to Descensions gameplay formula. The gameplay itself is Inspired by game modes like "COD Zombies" and "RE Mercenaries". Descension wants to constantly expand its world through live events, similarly to games like "destiny 2" and "ESO". Descension is aimed to be a fun, scary, and replayable experience.


This game is Currently in: Alpha 0.5

Made With Unity

May require High end PC to play without frame drop
